66b0d785bfa15d051888c24dabba7342 (10:13): b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea, is it easy to run html5lib directly from the hg repo to try out some fixes?
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (10:15): 66b0d785bfa15d051888c24dabba7342: Once you have a clone? Yes
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (10:16): either cd into the python directory and import html5lib
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (10:16): Or setup a virtualenv or so and do python setup.py develop
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (10:16): and it will be the installed version in the whole virtualenv
66b0d785bfa15d051888c24dabba7342 (10:17): haven't ever used virtualenv, does it have any benefits over the first option?
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (10:17): Not really in this case
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (10:17): In general, it is The Right Thing To Do
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (10:17): if you are writing python
66b0d785bfa15d051888c24dabba7342 (10:21): b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea, so does my hypothesis about the bug seem right?
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (10:27): 66b0d785bfa15d051888c24dabba7342: It seems that something is going wrong when we try to clone the token to reconstruct the active formatting element
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (10:28): Or maybe when we insert the attribute
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (10:28): In any case it seems very odd to have getcontext()< as the attribute name
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (10:28): ok
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (10:28): gonna post now
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (10:28): 66b0d785bfa15d051888c24dabba7342: BTW you know that you can just pass a string in to the parser, right?
66b0d785bfa15d051888c24dabba7342 (10:29): b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea, yes, but it didn't reproduce then
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (10:29): No need for a file
66b0d785bfa15d051888c24dabba7342 (10:29): or I just guessed the wrong syntax
66b0d785bfa15d051888c24dabba7342 (10:30): is it not  html5lib.parse("<p><code x<=foo></code></p>", treebuilder="lxml") ?

cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (11:12): puts <laugh> on the list of formatting elements and injects a bunch of <p>s in the input stream
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:13): guess I should fix EventSource tests today
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (11:13): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: it's better than fixing websocket tests, i bet
